wikipedia_page.main: Professor Sir Mark Jonathan Caulfield MD, FRCP, FESC, FPharm, FBHS, FMedSci  is a British genomic medicine researcher. He is the professor of Clinical Pharmacology at the William Harvey Research Institute in Queen Mary University of London. He was awarded a knighthood in the 2019 Birthday Honours.

response: * Sir Mark Caulfield, professor of Clinical Pharmacology, knighted in 2019
* Professor Sir Mark Caulfield (Chief Scientist), Queen Mary University of London
